tool_description: An API showing all the latest recession news around the world, collected from The New York Times, The Guardian, World Economic Forum, The Economist, AP News, Reuters, and Politico.
name: Global Recession Live
title: Global Recession Live

api_list.name: Get Specific News Articles By Publication
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the latest articles from a specific publication.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-recession-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-recession-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-recession-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-recession-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Global Recession News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the latest articles from 7 publications about worldwide recession news.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-recession-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-recession-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-recession-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-recession-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
